DataElement.preferredName: Person Interval Last Surgical Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/not applicable question as to whether a person's last time of surgery is acceptable based on eligibility criteria

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Interval Last Surgical Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having the specific time period since the last surgical procedure, a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue, as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Interval Last Surgical Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has it been at least 4 weeks
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been at least 4 weeks since the patient underwent any major surgery?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient undergone a major surgical procedure as defined in the protocol less than or equal to 4 weeks prior to treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN Patient has had major surgical procedure other than for diagnosis within 4 weeks prior to initiation of treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has had major surgical procedure other than for diagnosis within 4 weeks prior to initiation of treatment

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been less than 4 weeks since surgery?
